akn:section.akn:heading: Marine energy research, development, and demonstration

akn:content.akn:p: (a) In general The Secretary, in consultation with the Secretary of Defense, Secretary of Commerce (acting through the Under Secretary of Commerce for Oceans and Atmosphere) and other relevant Federal agencies, shall conduct a program of research, development, demonstration, and commercial application of marine energy technology, including activities to—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Study of non-power sector applications for advanced marine energy technologies

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Study of non-power sector applications for advanced marine energy technologies
